displacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your boxer briefs and kick them off your feet.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull down [npc.name]'s boxer briefs and slide them off [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s boxer briefs and roughly pull them down [npc.her] before lifting [npc.her] out of them.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls down [npc.her] boxer briefs and kick them off [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls down your boxer briefs and slides them off your feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your boxer briefs and roughly pulls them down, before lifting you out of them.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls down [npc2.name]'s boxer briefs and slides them off [npc2.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s boxer briefs and roughly pulls them down, before lifting [npc2.her] out of them.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull up your boxer briefs and kick them off your feet.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull up [npc.name]'s boxer briefs and slide them off [npc.her] feet.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s boxer briefs and roughly pull them up [npc.her] legs, lifting [npc.her] off the ground for a moment as you do so.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] steps into [npc.her] boxer briefs and pulls up [npc.her] legs.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls up your boxer briefs once you step into them.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your boxer briefs and roughly pulls them up your legs, lifting you off the ground for a moment as [npc.she] does.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls up [npc2.name]'s boxer briefs once [npc2.she] steps back into them.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s boxer briefs and roughly pulls them up [npc2.her] legs, lifting [npc2.her] off the ground for a moment as [npc1.she] does..
